SimpleBanner.title: Use of Cookies and Other Technologies
SimpleBanner.text: BImA uses cookies and similar technologies on its website for processing device information and personal data. The processing is used for integrating content, external services, and third-party elements, providing BImA's own services, and statistical analysis/measurement. Depending on the functionality, data may be shared with third parties within the EU. Your consent is always voluntary, not required for the use of our website, and can be declined or revoked at any time through the 'Cookie Settings' link in the footer below.
